ValidationRule.description: When the Status of the case is "Pending Closure" or "Closed", the Closure Code is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL ( Status, "Pending Closure" ), ISPICKVAL ( Status, "Closed") ), ISPICKVAL ( Closure_Code__c, "" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Code is required when Status is "Pending Closure" or "Closed".
